configBot.config:
Use: !config commandCharacter <new character to trigger the bot>
!config <privilege Role> <tag role here>
!config remove <privilege Role> <tag role here> 
Description: Configure the bot for the current server, allocate roles to roles recognised by the bot, and assign command permissions.
configBot.configShow:
Use: !configShow
Description: Shows the current stored bot configuration for the current server.

general.ping:
Use: !ping
Description: Bot replies with Pong!
general.lookbusy:
Use: !lookbusy
Description: Makes the bot appear to type for a period of time.
general.google:
Use: !google <search query string here>
Description: Generates a google search url using the given string as the query for the search.
general.source:
Use: !source
Description: The source code for this bot can be found at, https://github.com/LochMess/ButlerBot

roleQuery.roles:
Use: !roles
Description: List all the roles on the server.
roleQuery.myRoles:
Use: !myRoles
Description: List all of the roles you have on the current server.
roleQuery.roleMembers:
Use: !roleMembers <tag role here>
Description: List all the members of the given role.

roleChange.join:
Use: !join <tag role here>
Description: Used to join roles.
roleChange.leave:
Use: !leave <tag role here>
Description: Used to leave roles.

roleCreation.createRole:
Use: !createRole <role name here> -c <role colour in hex here>
Description: Create a new role for you and your squad. Hex colour selector https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_picker.asp

roleDeletion.deleteRole:
Use: !deleteRole <tag role here>
Description: Delete a role.
